participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and easy-going, Alex enjoys trying new things and is open to new experiences. She has a fun-loving nature and values humor in her interactions.
participant_1.background: I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up. I don’t know if I enjoy programming, or if it’s my only choice. I relax by watching horror movies with my favorite snacks and enjoy my tattoos. I'm not a picky eater, but I do have my preferences. I want someone who can make me laugh and share my love of pizza.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Reserved yet thoughtful, Jordan tends to keep his personal interests private. He finds comfort in routine and enjoys quiet activities.
participant_2.background: I prefer not to talk about my interests. My mother passed away in 1979. I like to swim in the lake. I enjoy a good cup of coffee in the morning to start my day off right. I have a standing bike in my house, and I use it several times a day.

content.text: Not much, I'm just relaxing on my couch. I like to swim in the lake. Do you like to swim?
Oh, that sounds nice. I do like to swim but it's been too cold lately.
Yeah, it has been chilly. I like to start my day off with a good cup of coffee. Do you drink coffee?
I love coffee! I have to have at least one cup every morning.
Me too! I have a standing bike in my house and I use it several times a day. Do you like to exercise?
I try to, but I'm not very good at it. I'm more of a gamer than a gym rat.
Haha, that's okay. I'm not much of a gamer, but I do enjoy watching horror movies.
Oh, me too! They're one of my favorite ways to relax.
I like to watch them with my favorite snacks. Do you have any favorite snacks?
I love chocolate, chips, and pizza. Do you have any favorite pizza toppings?
I like pepperoni and pineapple pizza. It's a bit unusual, but it's really good!
I've never tried pineapple pizza before, but I'm willing to give it a try.
